previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. Seattle Sounders | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 2, Seattle Sounders 4 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA will face a real test in putting their long winless and goalless streaks to an end, as they play host to overall leaders Seattle Sounders FC on Wednesday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs Seattle Sounders FC | September 3, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, Seattle Sounders FC 1. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from the center of the box to the center of the goal.  Assisted by Chad Marshall.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Obafemi Martins cleans up a loose ball in the box

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Seattle Sounders FC. Conceded by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado.

timelineItems.name: Jorge Morales
timelineItems.text: @chivasusa we're here give us a win #ChivasUSA #BLACKARMY1850 #supportyoucantbuy #sounders @blackarmy1850

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: I'm surprised Yedlin didn't get the call there. After dodging bullet, Chivas leave him unmarked #dangerous #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Clint Dempsey sends a shot inches wide of the post

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Ted Unkel is allowing chippy play, so that’s at least some excitement. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Sloppy defending and Martins is too good a player to whiff from that range. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Obafemi Martins.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Spectacular display of mercy by Clint Dempsey there. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Obafemi Martins.

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 13’ - CLINT AGAIN! Just chipped Kennedy but Hurtado there to clear off the line. This one could get ugly. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Evans, of all people, takes a corner, and it bounces to Martins, who does a Wondo (the good kind, not the World Cup kind). #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Goalline save by former Sounder Jhon Kennedy Hurtado. El Presidente read the chip perfectly #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Seattle Sounders FC. Clint Dempsey tries a through ball, but Obafemi Martins is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Tony Lochhead.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: So Martins just scored in the same minute that @cdchivasusa eclipsed their own team record for consecutive scoreless minutes. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, Seattle Sounders FC 2. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the center of the box to the center of the goal.  Assisted by Lamar Neagle.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Obafemi Martins gets the easy finish for his second of the game

timelineItems.name: Eric Hole
timelineItems.text: For real though, Chivas can't hold Dempsey and Oba #CHVvSEA #GoSounders

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Dempsey Should Have Done Better™ twice in the space of 90 seconds. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: I'm Ok with how this is going so far.

timelineItems.comment: Lamar Neagle (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Akira Kaji (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: God Chivas TBD, have some pride. Too easy for some world class strikers. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Eric Hole
timelineItems.text: Good job Neagle for not being selfish. More oba goals pls #CHVvSEA #GoSounders

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Seattle Sounders FC. Conceded by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Vastly different chances early. http://t.co/rrkQX9eubB http://t.co/4JZtjmkDsj #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Dempsey, Neagle and Martins use Chivas defenders as practice field cones. Seattle up to 2. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Kevin Tatroe
timelineItems.text: Good as he is, Chivas’ strategy of “everyone just stand around and let Hurtado do all the work” isn’t likely to work out for them. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Clint Dempsey pulls his shot just wide of the frame

timelineItems.comment: Eric Avila (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Brad Evans (Seattle Sounders FC).
Match ends, Chivas USA 2, Seattle Sounders FC 4.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Martins (http://t.co/BPaB11ISrO) and Rose (http://t.co/OjUhCatrWf) each score braces in a 4-2 win. #CHVvSEA http://t.co/ZBcRo5YLBM

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA will face a real test in putting their long winless and goalless streaks to an end, as they play host to overall leaders Seattle Sounders FC on Wednesday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA vs Seattle Sounders FC | September 3, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Brad Evans.

timelineItems.name: Laura Morarity
timelineItems.text: This game makes me sad. Poor Chivas. I think the Sounders have half the fans and all the talent. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Jason Long
timelineItems.text: Happy that Mauro is now at Vancouver so he doesn't have to face this. #MLS #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Fantasy Bean
timelineItems.text: Clint Dempsey could have a hat trick to go with Oba’s brace right now. In the 21’. Against another professional team. #CHVvSEA #sounders

timelineItems.name: Ben
timelineItems.text: Chivas playing a high-line against Oba Martins makes entertaining viewing. Seattle could get double-figures here.. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Sometimes you just need to tip your hat and just appreciate greatness. Dempsey and Martins are each good but incredible together #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Dempsey, on the other hand, seems to have had a voodoo spell placed on him. Near miss after near miss. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Félix Borja.
Foul by Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC).
Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: ba'al till i fa'll
timelineItems.text: Play by play sounds like it belongs in a pornographic film with casino adverts mixed in #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Lamar Neagle (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Obafemi Martins.

timelineItems.name: Heather Parry
timelineItems.text: All I want is a typical Ozzie goal (from distance) and then my life will be complete. #seavchv #soundersfc

timelineItems.name: Kayl Parker
timelineItems.text: Can we start involving Neagle in the game? When he's wide open in front of goal? #favorite #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: #CRIMESCENE
timelineItems.text: Neither team is playing defense. The only difference is one doesn't have to while the other is just that bad. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Airkeeper
timelineItems.text: Get @oba_martins his hat trick and then free for all for Deuce and Lamar. #CHVvSEA #ebfg

timelineItems.comment: Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: With every match like this, the selling price of Chivas USA is marked down a bit more. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: Right time. Right place. @oba_martins wastes little time giving the Sounders a one-goal lead. http://t.co/ifnhOUtnMV #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Hershey M Islas
timelineItems.text: #chivasUSA vs #SeattleSounders ⚽️⚽️⚽️❤️ we getting kill though. #MLS #losangeles

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Felix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Felix Borja rolls a shot right at Frei

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: This isn't even trying to be funny, there are maybe 500 people at StubHub Center. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: chivasusa
timelineItems.text:
#ChivasUSA Starting XI | Alineación: Kennedy; Kaji, Burling; Hurtado, Lochhead; Delgado, Reo-Coker, Minda, Avila; Borja, Finley

On bench | En la banca: Spangenberg, Sturgis, Barrera, Chavez, Bolaños, Pelletieri, Jean-Baptiste

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: MLS needs owners with as deep pockets as NYCFC to pull this club out of the dollar bin. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Nigel Reo-Coker.
Foul by Bobby Burling (Chivas USA).
Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: That was actually a shot by a Chivas player! Not much of a shot, but baby steps. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ryan Finley (Chivas USA).
Chad Marshall (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Oswaldo Minda.

timelineItems.name: Melissa Stebbins
timelineItems.text: I love it when our boys are winning, but I also feel bad for Chivas. It feels like picking on the scrawny kid at school. #EBFG #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: I don’t even think Galaxy fans feel any schadenfreude for the Goats, just the same sadness the rest of us feel. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Osvaldo Alonso with a through ball.
Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Carlos Chavez
timelineItems.text: Where are all those Chivas fans from Sundays game? #CHVvSEA http://t.co/mzJv3NTYlt

timelineItems.name: switcherMark
timelineItems.text: 2 goals from Evans set play service. Nice. Goooooal! #SoundersFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Brad Evans (Seattle Sounders FC).
Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: This crowd feels like a random Wednesday at Arrowhead circa 2002. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Ryan Finley (Chivas USA).
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Andy Rose.

timelineItems.name: Matt Dewey
timelineItems.text: Going into the locker room at the half: Sigh - “Who else wants to score tonight?” #SoundersFC #EBFG #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Tony Lochhead following a corner.

timelineItems.name: ⚽️ ️
timelineItems.text: Chivas players just stood around looking confused #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, Seattle Sounders FC 4. Andy Rose (Seattle Sounders FC) header from the center of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Brad Evans.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Andy Rose heads home his second of the night

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado (Chivas USA).
Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: The game's out of reach but the Chivas desperately needs to find something to pull out of it's downward spiral #chvvsea

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Sigi should put Jordan Morris in. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Is this groundhog day? Didn't we just see that? #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Eric Hole
timelineItems.text: That was literally the exact same play. Great service from Brad. #CHVvSEA #GoSounders

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Andy Rose. Far post. Got it. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: No shame in Chivas just throwing in the towel at half. This is bad. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: It's totally not going to blow up in Unkel's face that he's 'letting them play.' Totally confident with that. Totally.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Stefan Frei gets low to deny Ryan Finley

timelineItems.name: Michael Demko
timelineItems.text: For real though, this attendance is silly ... even for Chivas #CHVvSEA #MLS http://t.co/vIaKX8AjfJ

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Caito
timelineItems.text: Just because one team is beating another thoroughly, does not mean you can't give fouls. I want consistency. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Chivas USA 0, Seattle Sounders FC 4.

timelineItems.name: Shawn Duncan
timelineItems.text: Hey Chivas, the offside trap doesn't work when only three people do it... #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Gol! Hydrating Power Fuel.
timelineItems.text:
Seattle Sounders 4
Chivas USA .. 0  42minutes in.. #goal,#gol,#score,#chivasusa,#seattlesounders,#Golbev,#soccer,#Carson,#stub hub,#stubhubcenter ,#chivas,#sounders,#xboxone,#adidas

timelineItems.name: Dan Irwin
timelineItems.text: This second half will really test the desire of the @cdchivasusa players. No reason to hang head wholly and concede anything. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Well that half went exactly the way I expected, seriously.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Priceless quote. #CHVvSEA RT @sounderatheart Sigi at half says that he'd like to rest guys, but that they are all having fun and want goals.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: "Dempsey doesn't want to come out until he gets a goal, and Oba probably wants a hattrick." Sigi then drops the mic. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: At the rate the #ChivasUSA crowds are going, Oct. 26 against San Jose could literally be "Fan" Appreciation Day #MLS #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: Andy Rose scored his first two goals of the season in the first half. This was his second one. http://t.co/p2bLuudU1v #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Chivas USA 0, Seattle Sounders FC 4.

timelineItems.name: Jorge Morales
timelineItems.text: 4-0 thanks @chivasusa I think the @blackarmy1850 is working harder than the team #ChivasUSA #supportyoucantbuy  #seattlesounders #earnyourstripes

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Seattle Sounders FC. Conceded by Akira Kaji.

timelineItems.name: Seth Kuhns
timelineItems.text: Jean-Baptiset? Even their equipment guy is a wreck. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.desc: Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Bobby Burling puts a shoulder into Martins

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Seattle Sounders FC. Conceded by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.

timelineItems.name: Matt Dewey
timelineItems.text: Oh god, my 6 year old just looked at the score and asked if I was playing a video game... #SoundersFC #EBFG #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Chad Marshall (Seattle Sounders FC).
Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leonardo González (Seattle Sounders FC).
Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 1, Seattle Sounders FC 4. Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) header from the right side of the six yard box to the top left corner. Assisted by Eric Avila.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Marco Delgado heads in from close range

timelineItems.name: Rebekah Kraft
timelineItems.text: 4 more goals!!! #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: Is having someone run into you really a yellow card? #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA scoreless drou8gh is officially over after 597 minutes #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Eric Avila (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (Seattle Sounders FC).
Attempt missed. Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Eric Avila with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: I think there may have been some kind of gentlemen’s agreement to let Chivas score before breaking their futility record. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: The @cdchivasusa goalless streak ends at 597 minutes, third-longest single-season streak in league history. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Brad Evans.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Don't call it a comeback... because it seriously won't be one. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Delgado's goal prevents Chivas from breaking their own goalless streak of 601 minutes #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Oswaldo Minda.

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Zach Scott (Seattle Sounders FC) after a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Zach Scott trips Ryan Finley in the box

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 2, Seattle Sounders FC 4. Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Ryan Finley sneaks his penalty kick under Frei

timelineItems.name: Airkeeper
timelineItems.text: The way Oba has been hacked all night, methinks it is time for some Barrett. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Penalty Chivas USA. Ryan Finley draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Zach Scott (Seattle Sounders FC) after a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: JaviER
timelineItems.text: Again fighting over who shoots the PK. #CHVvSEA SMH

timelineItems.name: Matt Dewey
timelineItems.text: Seriously? What a stupid way to give them a goal… Come on guys. #SoundersFC #EBFG #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Zach Scott, doing what Zach Scott does. (Which is foul in poor spots.) #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bobby Burling (Chivas USA).
Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Matt Dewey
timelineItems.text: #SoundersMatchday! Get those SCARVES UP SEATTLE! #SoundersFC #EBFG #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Those of you watching at home--it's not snow in Carson. There's been a lot of confetti piling up lately #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Felix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Felix Borja is not far off with his shot from the top of the box

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: My word it's 4-2, Ryan Finley from the spot after Zach Scott's clumsy challenge! Chivas goals are like London buses... #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 12 - After losing their first 2 #MLS meetings with @ChivasUSA, Seattle are undefeated in 12 since, winning six in a row. Dominant. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Frank MacDonald
timelineItems.text: Pressure to beat a poor team is no different than pressure to beat fellow contender, no? #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Airkeeper
timelineItems.text: Love @GonzoPineda8 but he deserves the rest. Excited for @andyrose_5 to get another start & glad he's back from injury. #ebfg #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Airkeeper
timelineItems.text: There very well may be more people at my friends' home to watch the @SoundersFC match than there are people at StubHub. #CHVvSEA #ebfg

timelineItems.name: Gol! Hydrating Power Fuel.
timelineItems.text: Chivas Score!!! @chivasusa @siempre_chivas @adidasfootball #chivasusa,#cdchivasusa,#seattlesounders ,#mls ,#majorleaguesoccer,#sounders,#header,#gol,#goal,#Golbev,#stubhubcenter ,#Clint Dempsey,#cubo,#los Angeles

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Nigel Reo-Coker.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 5 - Both Chivas USA and Seattle have kept five clean sheets in 14 #MLS meetings with one another. Hope. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Frank MacDonald
timelineItems.text: Sad backdrop to pregame show, the mass of empty StubHub seats. Got to give those missing & those diehards some hope. Rebrand ASAP. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Just spotted Kenny Cooper applauding and waving to the visiting #sounders fans. That guy is a class act in my book. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: To all the Sounders and Chivas fans east of the Mississippi, we raise our coffee mug to you. Let's finish the evening right. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: Your @SoundersFC is those BEAUTIFUL #RaveGreen kits. Green tops, green shorts, blue socks. Stunning. Chivas in red. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: See what you've done, Chivas? Now Sigi has to do some coaching. You won't like Sigi when he's coaching. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Big GJP
timelineItems.text: Should I drive up to StubHub to see the greatest soccer comeback of all time? #ChivasUSA #Seattle

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: Marco Delgado ends Chivas' scoreless streak with a pretty far-post header http://t.co/102XmCyb1S #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Osvaldo Alonso (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Brad Evans.
Chad Marshall (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Félix Borja (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Justin
timelineItems.text: LET THE COMEBACK COMMENCE!!! #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Brad Evans (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.desc: Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Oswaldo Minda is booked for persistent infringement

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).
Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Megan Myers
timelineItems.text: I'm so tired and I have to get up early tomorrow but #CHVvSEA is too good. #EastCoastProblems @LIVESounders

timelineItems.comment: Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Chad Barrett (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: Sandra Anni
timelineItems.text: C'mon guys. Get hungry again. Dempsey. Rose. Martins... Anyone. Gooooaaall already!! #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: Ok, who had Marco Delgado to break #Chivas scoring drought? I am at #usopen, can someone please tell me if #CHVvSEA is as exciting as this?

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Oswaldo Minda picks up a yellow card and he, too, will be suspended for Sunday's #ChivasUSA game at Columbus

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Tony Lochhead.

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 75’ - 4,021 is your attendance. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Airkeeper
timelineItems.text: Tonight's #CHVvSEA official Unkel hasn't lived up to his card-happy rep, but has to his fails to make the big calls rep.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: A very shorthanded #ChivasUSA side coming to Columbus on Sunday. Minda played in the World Cup.

timelineItems.name: Jon Freeman
timelineItems.text: I really wanted see Okoli get some minutes tonight. Sadly, Sounders don't pay me for my thoughts on the matter. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Brad Evans (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: The Chivas fans may actually, literally, in reality be outnumbered by traveling Sounders fans. Certainly sonically. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Osvaldo Alonso (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Brad Evans.

timelineItems.name: Eddie Magana
timelineItems.text: Better then nothing 😁⚽️😎#CHVvSEA #MLS #FearTheGoat #SeattleSounders #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Zach Scott (Seattle Sounders FC).
Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA) header from the center of the box is high and wide to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Andrew Jean-Baptiste sends a header high and wide

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Leonardo González (Seattle Sounders FC).
Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Luis Bolaños with a cross following a set piece situation.
Attempt blocked. Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC).
Attempt missed. Luis Bolaños (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Félix Borja.

timelineItems.name: Airkeeper
timelineItems.text: After a first 45 of intensity, @SoundersFC second 45 has been lackluster or, dare I say, apathetic. #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Luis Bolaños (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Andrew Jean-Baptiste.

timelineItems.name: BOG
timelineItems.text: Remember that time 20 minutes ago when Chivas scored two goals in 10 minutes. #Memories #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.name: Topher Endress
timelineItems.text: Dempsey. I love you, but you gotta stop pandering for penalties just because you want on the scoreboard #CHVvSEA #SeattleWillWinRegardless

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chivas so far areholding their own against a first choice #Sounders squad but its early, very early. #chvvsea

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA).
Attempt missed. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Marvin Chávez.
Leonardo González (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA).
Félix Borja (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Zach Scott (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: Remember, this is Seattle’s FIRST-STRING defense. #permeable #CHVvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Chivas USA 2, Seattle Sounders FC 4.
